FirstTime.title: Haere mai, welcome!
FirstTime.description: Get access to Maori resources and information that is relevant and important to you.

FirstTime.title: Customise your feed
FirstTime.description: Select your topics to receive real-time notifications to your smartphone or tablet.

FirstTime.title: Share & Save
FirstTime.description: Share with your whanau and friends or simply save the information and access it when it suits you.
